channel.title: Bake the Hugo on Hugo & Tailwind 3.0 & Pizza
channel.description: Recent content in Bake the Hugo on Hugo & Tailwind 3.0 & Pizza

item.title: Why Hugo?
item.description:
Why Hugo and not Wordpress, Drupal etc?

Hugo is a static site generator. Your website is simply HTML and maybe some JavaScript

item.title: WEBP
item.description: Convert automatically your JPG/PNG/GIF to the small *.webp format!

item.title: Compare Images
item.description: Compare two images with a slider. A nice feature for before/after images.

item.title: jQuery
item.description: Use jQuery links in the header only when you need them!

item.title: Cookies
item.description: You need a cookies policy? Here is one…

item.title: GraphComment
item.description: A good alternative for a comment system is GraphComment. Their free tier account is quite useable.

item.title: Small Tricks
item.description: A few small tricks not really worth having their own page:
